function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation and indoor air quality (IAQ) leading to the transmission of airborne viruses like COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air filtration and purification, and increasing air exchange rates","Technologies":"Air purifiers, mechanical ventilation systems, and natural ventilation designs","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, especially in multi-story apartment buildings","Owner":"Building owners, architects, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate sound insulation in multi-story apartment buildings","Impact":"Risk of increased transmission of airborne viruses and other contagious diseases due to close proximity and shared airspace","Mitigation":"Improving sound insulation, creating physical barriers, and implementing noise-reducing technologies","Technologies":"Sound-dampening materials, noise-canceling systems, and acoustic design solutions","People":"Residents of multi-story apartment buildings and neighboring units","Owner":"Property developers, construction companies, and building managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate natural light and views leading to reduced psychological well-being and immunity","Impact":"Reduced immune response and increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Maximizing access to natural light, incorporating nature views, and providing green spaces","Technologies":"Skylights, windows with a view, and biophilic design elements","People":"Residents of homes and apartments","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, and building owners"}]}
